text: BREAKING: 🇸🇻 El Salvador President says they will buy one #BTC every day "until #Bitcoin becomes unaffordable with fiat currencies." https://t.co/QDOJ7c7uwj

El Salvador made #Bitcoin legal tender, bought #BTC for their reserves, held it through the bear market, is buying more, and now holds their own keys in cold storage 🇸🇻

Bullish 🫡 https://t.co/cdjf7bm74Y

Two days ago MicroStrategy bought $821.7 million worth of #Bitcoin

Yesterday Michael Saylor said "The endgame is to acquire more Bitcoin. Whoever gets the most #Bitcoin wins."

Today, MicroStrategy is raising $500 million to buy more #BTC 

Legend. https://t.co/tZauCHMdEh
